title: Ruslan Zubkov
text:
Ruslan Vladyslavovych Zubkov (; born 24 November 1991) is a Ukrainian professional <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29">defender</a>.
Career.
Zubkov previously played for <a href="FC%20Chornomorets%20Odessa">Chornomorets Odessa</a> youth teams and <a href="FC%20Odessa">FC Odessa</a>. In June 2012, he joined to <a href="AZAL%20PFC">AZAL PFC</a> and signed two years-long contract and was loaned by <a href="PFC%20Turan%20Tovuz">Turan Tovuz</a>. In December he came back to his club. Zubkov was made a free agent when Araz-Naxçıvan folded and withdrew from the <a href="Azerbaijan%20Premier%20League">Azerbaijan Premier League</a> on 17 November 2014.
